awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: A harsh portrait of Turkey, its people and its authorities, shown through the stories of five prisoners given a week's home leave, and the problems they encounter in adjusting to the world outside.

title: Yol
